c-0: ^Tim` Fantastic! I can't wait to read what you think about us!
^Tim` Oh, and you have to make sure to watch the show! All the acrobats are excited to impress you.
^Well, I look forward to being impressed. You know, while I have you, can I ask you a few questions?

Choices: ^What kind of work do you get up to here?
^What's your favorite thing about working here?
Choice1: ^Tim` I'm an acrobat, I'm here for the flying, the vaults, the trapeze...

c-0: ^Tim` Anything that sees me flying through the air like a bird.
^Tim` Sure. Every time I get to perform is a dream come true.
^Tim` It all seems so simple nowadays, but I love seeing everyone in the audience in awe.
^Tim` Yeah. Some fans even give me flowers after a good performance.
^Tim` The truth is, I hardly need any more. I already have the one on my uniform.
^Tim` The rest just go in my dressing room.

Outro: ^That's lovely. Thank you so much. It'll all fit nicely into the piece. (exit)
